SEARCH
Package SC2002.Project.control

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
SC2002.Project.control.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
Controller for managing BTO housing projects in the system.

This controller handles all operations related to projects:

  • Creating new projects with proper validation
  • Managing project details and flat types
  • Controlling project visibility to applicants
  • Officer assignment and management
  • Project enquiry management

Fulfills the following requirements:

  • Allows managers to create and manage BTO projects
  • Supports flat type and unit management
  • Controls officer assignment to projects with proper validation
  • Manages project visibility to control which projects applicants can view
  • Validates project dates and prevents scheduling conflicts
  • Provides filtering capabilities for project discovery

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectController

      public ProjectController()
      Creates a new ProjectController instance. Initializes the controller with access to the central data store.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(String name, String neighbourhood, List<String> flatTypes, List<Integer> totalUnits, List<Double> prices, LocalDate open, LocalDate close, boolean visible, int officerSlots, HDB_Manager manager)
      Creates a new BTO housing project with the specified details. This fulfills the requirement for managers to create projects. Performs validation to ensure project dates don't overlap for a manager and that close date is after open date.
      Parameters:
      name - Project name
      neighbourhood - Location of the project
      flatTypes - List of flat types offered (e.g., "2-ROOM", "3-ROOM")
      totalUnits - Number of units available for each flat type
      prices - Price of each flat type
      open - Opening date for applications
      close - Closing date for applications
      visible - Whether the project is visible to applicants
      officerSlots - Number of officer slots available for this project
      manager - Manager responsible for this project
      Returns:
      The created Project object, or null if creation failed

    • findById

      public Project findById(int id)
      Finds a project by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project to find
      Returns:
      The project with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • listAll

      public List<Project> listAll()
      Lists all projects in the system. Provides a copy to prevent modification of the underlying list.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of all projects

    • renameProject

      public boolean renameProject(int projectId, String newName)
      Updates the name of an existing project. Ensures the change is propagated to all related applications and bookings.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      newName - The new name for the project
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found

    • changeNeighbourhood

      public boolean changeNeighbourhood(int projectId, String newHood)
      Updates the neighbourhood (location) of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      newHood - The new neighbourhood for the project
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found

    • updateFlatTypeUnits

      public boolean updateFlatTypeUnits(int projectId, String flatType, int newUnits)
      Updates the number of units available for a specific flat type. Ensures that units can't be reduced below the number already booked.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      flatType - The flat type to update (e.g., "2-ROOM")
      newUnits - The new number of units available
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project or flat type not found

    • addFlatType

      public boolean addFlatType(int projectId, String flatType, int units, double price)
      Adds a new flat type to an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      flatType - The flat type to add (e.g., "4-ROOM")
      units - The number of units available for this flat type
      price - The price for this flat type
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found or flat type already exists

    • removeFlatType

      public boolean removeFlatType(int projectId, String flatType)
      Removes a flat type from an existing project. Ensures all applications for this flat type are updated to REJECTED status.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      flatType - The flat type to remove
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project or flat type not found

    • updateFlatPrice

      public boolean updateFlatPrice(int projectId, String flatType, double newPrice)
      Updates the price of a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      flatType - The flat type to update
      newPrice - The new price for this flat type
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project or flat type not found

    • setOpenDate

      public boolean setOpenDate(int projectId, LocalDate openDate)
      Sets the application opening date for a project. Validates that the open date is not after the close date.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      openDate - The new opening date for applications
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found or date invalid

    • setCloseDate

      public boolean setCloseDate(int projectId, LocalDate closeDate)
      Sets the application closing date for a project. Validates that the close date is not before the open date.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      closeDate - The new closing date for applications
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found or date invalid

    • setVisibility

      public boolean setVisibility(int projectId, Visibility state)
      Sets the visibility of a project to control whether applicants can see it. Fulfills the requirement for managers to control project visibility.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      state - The new visibility state (ON or OFF)
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found

    • setOfficerSlotLimit

      public boolean setOfficerSlotLimit(int projectId, int newLimit)

      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      newLimit - The new officer slot limit
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found or limit invalid

    • getEnquiries

      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      List of enquiries for the specified project

    • canAssignOfficer

      public boolean canAssignOfficer(int projectId, HDB_Officer officer)
      Checks if an officer can be assigned to a project without actually assigning them. Validates officer slot availability and checks for scheduling conflicts.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      officer - The officer to check
      Returns:
      True if assignment is possible, false otherwise (with error messaging)

    • assignOfficer

      public boolean assignOfficer(int projectId, HDB_Officer officer)
      Assigns an officer to a project after validating the assignment. Fulfills the requirement for managers to assign officers to projects.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      officer - The officer to assign
      Returns:
      True if assignment was successful, false otherwise

    • unassignOfficer

      public boolean unassignOfficer(int projectId, HDB_Officer officer)
      Unassigns an officer from a project. Fulfills the requirement for managers to manage officer assignments.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      officer - The officer to unassign
      Returns:
      True if unassignment was successful, false otherwise

    • filterByNeighbourhood

      public List<Project> filterByNeighbourhood(String hood)
      Filters projects by neighbourhood/location. Fulfills the requirement for applicants to search projects by location.
      Parameters:
      hood - The neighbourhood to filter by
      Returns:
      List of projects in the specified neighbourhood

    • filterByFlatType

      public List<Project> filterByFlatType(String type)
      Filters projects by flat type. Fulfills the requirement for applicants to search projects by flat type.
      Parameters:
      type - The flat type to filter by (e.g., "3-ROOM")
      Returns:
      List of projects offering the specified flat type

    • filterVisible

      public List<Project> filterVisible()
      Filters projects to show only visible ones. Fulfills the requirement that applicants can only see projects with visibility set to ON.
      Returns:
      List of visible projects

    • assignManager

      public void assignManager(Project p, HDB_Manager manager)
      Assigns a manager to a project after validation. Checks for overlapping project management periods.
      Parameters:
      p - The project to assign a manager to
      manager - The manager to assign

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(int projectId)
      Toggles the visibility of a project (ON â†” OFF). Fulfills the requirement for managers to control which projects are visible to applicants.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to toggle
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(int projectId, HDB_Manager manager)
      Deletes a project from the system. Verifies that the manager requesting deletion is the one assigned to the project, and updates all related applications to REJECTED status.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to delete
      manager - The manager requesting deletion
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if project not found or manager mismatch
